about_the_game:
This is the skin DLC for《回家 - Homeward》
Let characters to change into new outfits, go to school with school bag！

Go to school skin bundles
1.Leopard Cat：Go to school skin
2.Formosan Black Bear：Go to school skin
3.Formosan Rock-monkey：Go to school skin
4.Formosan Clouded Leopard：Go to school skin

After purchasing, please go to the in-game store page to choose "Put on"
detailed_description:

Let characters to change into new outfits, go to school with school bag！

4.Formosan Clouded Leopard：Go to school skin

After purchasing, please go to the in-game store page to choose "Put on"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
